Crime Quotes

Poverty is the mother of crime.

Flavius Magnus Aurelius Cassiodorus Senator

Disgrace does not consist in the punishment, but in the crime.

Mohamed Abdel Moneim Fayed

It is not a merit to tolerate, but rather a crime to be intolerant.

Percy Bysshe Shelley

Guide the people by law, subdue them by punishment; they may shun crime, but will be void of shame. Guide them by example, subdue them by courtesy; they will learn shame, and come to be good.


To have committed every crime but that of being a father.

Emil Cioran

The invasion of Iraq was simply a war crime. Straight-out war crime.

Noam Chomsky

Crime is terribly revealing. Try and vary your methods as you will, your tastes, your habits, your attitude of mind, and your soul is revealed by your actions.

Dame Agatha Mary Clarissa Christie

Murder is unique in that it abolishes the party it injures, so that society has to take the place of the victim and on his behalf demand atonement or grant forgiveness; it is the one crime in which society has a direct interest.

W.H. Auden

If a father commands a son to commit a crime so terrible that the son can't do it and live with himself, then is it betrayal for the son to disobey his father?

Orson Scott Card

Murder is a horror, but an often necessary horror, never criminal, which it is essential to tolerate in a republican State. Is it or is it not a crime? If it is not, why make laws for its punishment? And if it is, by what barbarous logic do you, to punish it, duplicate it by another crime?

Marquis De Sade

Punishment is the last and the least effective instrument in the hands of the legislator for the prevention of crime.

John Ruskin

Some day, even the experts will figure out, that crime is not caused by rap music...or even my music, but by a power structure of self-absorbed property owners so brain dead and stupid they won't even see that if you're too goddamn greedy to pay taxes for schools and services, they're not going to be any good any more! And that uneducated time bombs are a very poor investment as a future work force. And if you go on teaching people that life is cheap, and leave them to rot in ghettos and jails, they may one day feel justified in coming back to rob and kill you. Duh!

Jello Biafra

Why would you shed a tear for them when they in return crack a smile for your loss because of the impending extra money they will receive in their next paycheck for sitting at your loved ones crime scene of 6 hours because of the overtime they will accrue.

Christopher Jordan Dorner

When your family members die, they just see you as extra overtime at a crime scene and at a perimeter.

Christopher Jordan Dorner

He felt at once betrayed and betrayer, deceived and deceiver. He was a criminal forced into crime, an unwilling whore.

Peter Benchley

The Scamdex Scam Email Archive

Subject:  Good Day
From:  Herman Reid <>
Date:  Mon, 04 Sep 2017 15:40:33 -0400
Date Added:  2018-08-16 17:35:13

This Email with the Subject "Good Day" was received in one of Scamdex's honeypot email accounts on Mon, 04 Sep 2017 15:40:33 -0400 and has been classified as a Advance Fee Fraud/419 Scam Email. The sender shows as Herman Reid <>, although that address was probably spoofed. We recommend that you do not attempt to contact any persons or organizations referenced in this email, or follow any URLs as you may expose yourself to scammers and, at the very least, you will be added to their email address lists for spam purposes.

South Carolina Man, 26, Charged - Collin D Morisi of Georgetown County

Georgetown County, SC |
Loading the player...
Collin Morisi was charged on Sunday, June 14th, 2015 by officials according to public records. Click here to view official charges.

According to reports obtained by South Carolina Arrests on Tuesday, June 16th, 2015, officials in South Carolina have busted Collin Daniel Morisi of Georgetown County, SC.

The suspect, Morisi, was charged by authorities on Sunday, June 14th, 2015, according to official records obtained from local authorities. He has allegedly been charged with a single offense. Interestingly, when South Carolina Arrests conducted a cross reference check for Collin Morisi, we located 1 possible previous arrests for Morisi.

Morisi, DOB 11/14/1988, was described as a man of 26 years age. South Carolina Arrests will update this story as more information becomes available.

Every effort has been made to ensure the integrity of these data, however, South Carolina Arrests makes no claims of guarantee surrounding the accuracy of such alleged facts, as Collin Morisi is to be considered innocent until proven guilty in a court of law. Last updated on .
